skillTree.localised_description: All Dwarfs despise the Greenskins, for the urki and grobi are the prime agents in the Times of Woe.

effects.description: Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Greenskins

skillTree.localised_description: Dwarfs are resolute - once they commit to charging the foe, they put all their strength behind that initial blow.
Dwarfs are not fast, yet they will soldier on, always moving despite any hazards encountered.
The endless courage of the Warrior God, directed to bolster this Dawi’s own reserves.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: With his unnatural gift of persuasion, Engrol can twist any situation to be of benefit to his lords and allies.

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Men, High Elves, Wood Elves, Lizardmen and Dwarfs
Diplomatic relations: +15 with Men, High Elves, Wood Elves, Lizardmen and Dwarfs

skillTree.localised_description: Engrol is famous for striking lucrative trade deals where even the most experienced businessmen have failed.

effects.description: Reduce Ancillary costs from all Traders by -3% (Local Contracts)
Reduce Ancillary costs from all Traders by -6% (Local Contracts)
Increase maximum number of units from returning settlements by +1
Reduce Ancillary costs from all Traders by -12% (Local Contracts)

skillTree.localised_description: Engrol’s bodyguard are fierce warriors who are completely loyal and will protect him in battle to the very last.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for all Dwarven units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Guardian" for all Dwarven infantry
	(Hero's army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

effects.description:
Upkeep: -10% for all Dwarven units
	(Hero's army)

Passive ability: "Guardian" for all Dwarven infantry
	(Hero's army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Engrol’s skills in diplomacy are unnaturally proficient for a Dwarf and he has resolved many quarrels with the Empire in his career spanning over two centuries.

effects.description: Diplomacy: +5 with all nations of Men
Diplomacy: +10 with all nations of Men
Diplomacy: +15 with all nations of Men

skillTree.localised_description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Full-plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, it’s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.
The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.
One bound by an oath to defend fights all the harder, gladly giving his life rather than face the dishonour of failure.

effects.description:
Vigour loss reduction: -33% for Hammerers units
	(all units in army)

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

related_attributes.bullet_text: When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

skillTree.localised_description: Deep-tunnel warfare requires one to become comfortable standing closer to explosions than is perhaps sensible.

effects.description: Attacks cause "Flammable" effect, reducing fire resistance

Ammunition: +50% for Irondrakes, Ironbreakers and Miners units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.localised_description: Long periods spent tracking foes far from the safety of the Holds makes experts at approaching enemies from unexpected angles.

effects.description:
Attribute: Snipe for Rangers units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.
This unit can move hidden in any terrain.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: This one is well-versed in the various court intrigues of the Asur, which is something of an advantage in matters of diplomacy.
"The Realms of Man must not fall."

effects.description: Diplomatic relations: +10 with Southern Realms and Norsca

skillTree.localised_description: He is well known enough to them to gain access to certain high-caste individuals.
This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Engrol Goldtongue is the official Dwarf Envoy from the fortress of Zhufbar to the Empire, relaying messages from the High King Grudgebearer to Emperor Franz.

effects.description: Allegiance points gained: +10% for alliances with Dwarfs

Upkeep: -5% for all Dwarven units
	(Hero's army)
When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead
